name: subterrestria
description:
Subterrestria is a 2D shooter set in underground caverns. Fend off waves of enemies who will relentlessly chase you with only mines to defend yourself.

Controls

  • WASD/Arrows/Left Stick - move
  • Left Ctrl/Gamepad X/A - drop mine

Subterrestria is currently in development. Please be mindful that there are bugs and tuning issues as well as planned features not yet implemented.
